long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The VMac Plugin extension is used in conjunction with VMac to obtain better accessibility integration with Google Chrome.

In particular, this extension enables the following features in Google Chrome when used with VMac:

- Reading aloud of selected text with highlight of words while the words are spoken
- Word suggestion while writing HLML Input Elements, Text Area elements, Editable elements, Word Online and Google Docs.
